attributes.action: Want The Decision For The RAH Ward 15 Closure To be Reconsidered
attributes.background: My 19 Month Old Has Been In And Out Of Ward 15 At The Rah Since He Was A Newborn Baby And Also Has Open Door Policy that I just Take Him To Ward 15 and they Deal With Him And Always Received A High Level Of Care At The RAH Children Will Die Due  To This Ward Getting Shut

rejection.details:
We think your petition is about Ward 15 at the Royal Alexandra Hospital, Paisley.  The Scottish Government is responsible for the NHS in Scotland. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can get in contact with them at petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
